message.body: Should we buy dad the DNA kit for his birthday to spit or should we try to have the results to him for his birthday?
How do you plan to have the results? You're going to steal his spit?
No we would have to tell him of course haha
I'm just thinking. We got it for Eden's dad and all he did was spit in a tube for his birthday
Oh true... but in the same sense, dad likes things drawn out. Like he use to save one xmas present for new years so that xmas want over yet. Getting the results later would be an extended bday
Also I got him a gift so he can open that on his birthday and even use it to pass the time until the results come in
That's cool, but they wouldn't accept me because I'm not a native speaker :(
They said "including" native only if accent free
Including those languages. But I think definitely native
Idk.. wouldn't hurt to apply tho. You have the voice for French just saying
Including those languages. But I think definitely native
Yea just check. .. can't hurt. If they don't find native applicants then they would pick the next best thing. Don't lose nothing if you apply
I want to get the DNA test for grandma too. I'm torn because I don't want to do it before dad, but I'm afraid to wait...
(I know I'm obsessed. Bare with me.)
